original_text:
Dazzle Me Megaways
NetEnt ha preso uno dei suoi giochi di slot più popolari e gli ha dato un restyling includendo il motore Megaways di Big Time Gaming. Come la prima versione, la Dazzle Me Megaways slot presenta i ben noti simboli delle gemme e della frutta per offrirti l’esperienza di gioco definitiva. Grazie ai Megaways, giocherai con fino a 99.225 modi per vincere. Oltre alle vincite a valanga, ci sono Dazzling Wild Reels e Free Spins per darti fino a 20.000 volte i premi in palio. NetEnt ha preso uno dei suoi giochi di slot più popolari e gli ha dato un restyling includendo il motore Megaways di Big Time Gaming. Come la prima versione, la Dazzle Me Megaways slot presenta i ben noti simboli delle gemme e della frutta per offrirti l’esperienza di gioco definitiva. Grazie ai Megaways, giocherai con fino a 99.225 modi per vincere. Oltre alle vincite a valanga, ci sono Dazzling Wild Reels e Free Spins per darti fino a 20.000 volte i premi in palio. Scopri di più nella nostra recensione completa della slot Dazzle Me Megaways.
Una grafica tradizionale ma di effetto
Proprio come il gioco originale, la Dazzle Me Megaways slot si gioca utilizzando una macchina a 6 rulli. Il set up è piuttosto diverso nel sequel però, a partire dalla meccanica Megaways. Ad ogni giro, tra 2 e 9 simboli possono apparire su ogni bobina.
Questo altera il numero di modi di vincere per quel giro. Se tutti e 6 i rulli raggiungono la loro altezza massima, avrai 99.225 Megaways attivi. Come al solito per una slot che usa un motore di gioco Megaways, i vincitori sono creati dall’atterraggio di simboli corrispondenti su rulli adiacenti, a partire dal rullo 1.
I livelli di puntata in Dazzle Me Megaways vanno da 20 centesimi a 200€ per giro. Clicca sull’icona delle monete per cambiare la dimensione della tua puntata di conseguenza. C’è anche una modalità Turbo e la funzione Autoplay in alcuni paesi (no nel Regno Unito da ottobre 2021).
L’RTP di Dazzle Megaways è del 96,1%, che è nella media per un gioco Megaways. Il tasso di frequenza di successo è del 23,63%, il che significa che quasi un quarto dei giri risulterà in una combinazione vincente.
La volatilità è nella fascia media in quanto le vincite più grandi verranno dai giri gratuiti. Il massimo che puoi vincere da un singolo giro e da una serie di valanghe qui è 50.000 x la tua puntata totale per giro.
Sentirai una colonna sonora classica in stile fruttato suonare in sottofondo mentre giri. Come al solito per una slot NetEnt, il design qui è luminoso e audace e la colonna sonora è vivace e ottimista.
Sui rulli, troverai un assortimento di simboli di pietre preziose che appaiono accanto ad alcune immagini fruttate classiche tra cui quadrifogli, campane e 7 fortunati. Il 7 fortunato è il simbolo più lucrativo, che paga 3 x la tua puntata totale se ne ottieni 6 sui rulli adiacenti.
Il diamante è il simbolo Wild. Questo può sostituire tutti i simboli standard quando fa parte di una combinazione vincente. Il wild può anche riempire intere bobine. Questi Dazzling Wild Reels sono in gioco durante il bonus round e possono davvero far partire l’azione quando si attivano i giri gratuiti.
Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Al centro dell’azione c’è il motore di gioco Megaways che selezionerà casualmente tra 2 e 9 simboli per atterrare sui rulli, in base all’altezza massima per il formato 5-5-7-7-9-9 e quindi crea ovunque da 64 a 99.225 modi per vincere per ogni giro.
Poi, c’è la meccanica dei rulli che ruzzolano con simboli a cascata, chiamata funzione Avalanche sulle slot NetEnt. Atterra tre o più simboli sui rulli adiacenti a partire da quello più a sinistra e avrai un vincitore. I simboli di una combinazione vincente esploderanno per fare spazio a nuovi simboli che cadranno al loro posto. La reazione a catena continuerà finché si verificheranno nuovi vincitori dopo una cascata, permettendoti di vincere potenzialmente più volte in una singola sequenza di spin.
L’obiettivo principale, tuttavia, sono ancora i Diamond Wilds, e questo nel gioco base e nei giri gratuiti. Appaiono solo durante la funzione Dazzling Wild Reels, che si attiva in modo casuale nel gioco principale e su ogni giro gratuito nel bonus round (più avanti per quest’ultimo). Lo schermo si oscura e fino a tre rulli tra il 2 e il 6 diventano wild per il giro corrente. Ottenendo una vincita contenente i simboli selvatici, questi si frantumeranno insieme agli altri simboli vincenti prima di essere sostituiti da simboli di pagamento regolari nella seguente Avalanche.
Per attivare la funzione Free Spins, dovrai far atterrare 4 simboli Free Spins ovunque sui rulli nello stesso giro. La tua ricompensa è di 8 giri gratis. Riceverai altri 4 giri gratis in aggiunta all’assegnazione minima per ogni simbolo di giri gratis extra che colpisce sul giro che si innesca. L’atterraggio di 6 simboli di giri gratuiti, per esempio, ti darà 16 giri gratuiti.
Durante la caratteristica, almeno 1 rullo con il trasformato in un Dazzling Wild Reel. L’intero rullo sarà Wild per quel giro gratuito e per qualsiasi valanga successiva che segue.
Poi hai la funzione Dazzling Wild Reels. Il numero di wilds che appaiono in un Dazzling Wild Reel inizia a 2. Ci sono opportunità di aggiungere a quel numero però. Ogni volta che ottieni una vincita che include un wild, il contatore per quel rullo aumenta di 1.

raw_translation.response:
Dazzle Me Megaways - A Review

NetEnt has revamped one of its most popular slot games by including the Big Time Gaming Megaways engine. Like its predecessor, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot features well-known gem and fruit symbols to offer you the ultimate gaming experience. With Megaways, you'll play with up to 99,225 ways to win. In addition to avalanche wins, there are Dazzling Wild Reels and Free Spins that can give you up to 20,000 times your winnings. NetEnt has revamped one of its most popular slot games by including the Big Time Gaming Megaways engine. Like its predecessor, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot features well-known gem and fruit symbols to offer you the ultimate gaming experience. With Megaways, you'll play with up to 99,225 ways to win. In addition to avalanche wins, there are Dazzling Wild Reels and Free Spins that can give you up to 20,000 times your winnings. Discover more in our complete review of the Dazzle Me Megaways slot.

A classic yet striking design
Just like the original game, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot is played using a 6-reel machine. However, the setup is quite different in the sequel, starting with the Megaways mechanic. At each spin, between 2 and 9 symbols can appear on each reel. This alters the number of ways to win for that spin. If all 6 reels reach their maximum height, you'll have 99,225 Megaways active. As usual for a slot that uses a Megaways game engine, winners are created by landing matching symbols on adjacent reels, starting from reel 1.

The betting levels in Dazzle Me Megaways range from 20 cents to €200 per spin. Click on the coin icon to change the size of your bet accordingly. There is also a Turbo mode and Autoplay feature in some countries (not in the UK from October 2021).

Dazzle Megaways RTP is 96.1%, which is average for a Megaways game. The success frequency rate is 23.63%, which means that almost a quarter of spins will result in a winning combination. Volatility is in the middle range, as the biggest wins will come from the free spins. The maximum you can win from a single spin and from a series of avalanches here is 50,000 x your total bet per spin.

You'll hear a classic fruity-style soundtrack playing in the background as you spin. As usual for a NetEnt slot, the design here is bright and bold, and the soundtrack is lively and optimistic. On the reels, you'll find an assortment of gem symbols alongside classic fruity images such as clovers, bells, and lucky 7s. The lucky 7 is the most lucrative symbol, paying out 3 x your total bet if you get 6 on adjacent reels.

The diamond is the Wild symbol. This can substitute for all standard symbols when it is part of a winning combination. The wild can also fill entire reels. These Dazzling Wild Reels are in play during the bonus round and can really kick off the action when the free spins are activated.

Features and symbols of the Slot Machine
At the heart of the action is the Megaways game engine that will randomly select between 2 and 9 symbols to land on the reels, based on the maximum height for the 5-5-7-7-9-9 format, and thus creates anywhere from 64 to 99,225 ways to win for each spin. Then, there's the rolling reels mechanic with cascading symbols, called the Avalanche function on NetEnt slots. Land three or more symbols on adjacent reels starting from the leftmost one, and you'll have a winner. The symbols in a winning combination will explode to make way for new symbols that will fall into their place. The chain reaction will continue until new winners occur after a cascade, allowing you to potentially win multiple times in a single spin sequence.

The main objective, however, are still the Diamond Wilds, both in the base game and in the free spins. They only appear during the Dazzling Wild Reels feature, which is randomly triggered in the main game and on every free spin in the bonus round (more on the latter later). The screen darkens, and up to three reels between 2 and 6 become wild for the current spin. Getting a win containing the wild symbols will shatter them along with the other winning symbols before being replaced by regular paying symbols in the following avalanche.

To activate the Free Spins feature, you'll need to land 4 Free Spins symbols anywhere on the reels in the same spin. Your reward is 8 free spins. You'll receive another 4 free spins in addition to the minimum allocation for each extra Free Spins symbol that hits on the triggering spin. Landing 6 free spins symbols, for example, will give you 16 free spins.

During the feature, at least 1 reel will be turned into a Dazzling Wild Reel. The entire reel will be Wild for that free spin and any subsequent cascades that follow.

Then there's the Dazzling Wild Reels feature. The number of wilds that appear on a Dazzling Wild Reel starts at 2. There are opportunities to add to that number though. Every time you get a win that includes a wild, the counter for that reel increases by 1.

Sentirai una colonna sonora classica in stile fruttato suonare in sottofondo mentre giri. Come al solito per una slot NetEnt, il design qui è luminoso e audace e la colonna sonora è vivace e ottimista.
Sui rulli, troverai un assortimento di simboli di pietre preziose che appaiono accanto ad alcune immagini fruttate classiche tra cui quadrifogli, campane e 7 fortunati. Il 7 fortunato è il simbolo più lucrativo, che paga 3 x la tua puntata totale se ne ottieni 6 sui rulli adiacenti.
Il diamante è il simbolo Wild. Questo può sostituire tutti i simboli standard quando fa parte di una combinazione vincente. Il wild può anche riempire intere bobine. Funzioni e simboli della Slot Machine
Al centro dell’azione c’è il motore di gioco Megaways che selezionerà casualmente tra 2 e 9 simboli per atterrare sui rulli, in base all’altezza massima per il formato 5-5-7-7-9-9 e quindi crea ovunque da 64 a 99.225 modi per vincere per ogni giro.
Poi, c’è la meccanica dei rulli che ruzzolano con simboli a cascata, chiamata funzione Avalanche sulle slot NetEnt. Atterra tre o più simboli sui rulli adiacenti a partire da quello più a sinistra e avrai un vincitore. I simboli di una combinazione vincente esploderanno per fare spazio a nuovi simboli che cadranno al loro posto. La reazione a catena continuerà finché si verificheranno nuovi vincitori dopo una cascata, permettendoti di vincere potenzialmente più volte in una singola sequenza di spin.
L’obiettivo principale, tuttavia, sono ancora i Diamond Wilds, e questo nel gioco base e nei giri gratuiti. Appaiono solo durante la funzione Dazzling Wild Reels, che si attiva in modo casuale nel gioco principale e su ogni giro gratuito nel bonus round (più avanti per quest’ultimo). Lo schermo si oscura e fino a tre rulli tra il 2 e il 6 diventano wild per il giro corrente. Ottenendo una vincita contenente i simboli selvatici, questi si frantumeranno insieme agli altri simboli vincenti prima di essere sostituiti da simboli di pagamento regolari nella seguente Avalanche.
Per attivare la funzione Free Spins, dovrai far atterrare 4 simboli Free Spins ovunque sui rulli nello stesso giro. La tua ricompensa è di 8 giri gratis. Riceverai altri 4 giri gratis in aggiunta all’assegnazione minima per ogni simbolo di giri gratis extra che colpisce sul giro che si innesca. L’atterraggio di 6 simboli di giri gratuiti, per esempio, ti darà 16 giri gratuiti.
Durante la caratteristica, almeno 1 rullo con il trasformato in un Dazzling Wild Reel. L’intero rullo sarà Wild per quel giro gratuito e per qualsiasi valanga successiva che segue.
Poi hai la funzione Dazzling Wild Reels. Il numero di wilds che appaiono in un Dazzling Wild Reel inizia a 2. Ci sono opportunità di aggiungere a quel numero però. Ogni volta che ottieni una vincita che include un wild, il contatore per quel rullo aumenta di 1.

message.content:
Review of Dazzle Me Megaways:
NetEnt has taken one of its most popular slot games and given it a makeover by including the Big Time Gaming Megaways engine. Just like the original version, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot features the well-known symbols of gems and fruits to offer you the ultimate gaming experience. Thanks to the Megaways, you can play with up to 99,225 ways to win. In addition to avalanche wins, there are Dazzling Wild Reels and Free Spins to give you up to 20,000 times the prizes at stake. NetEnt has taken one of its most popular slot games and given it a makeover by including the Big Time Gaming Megaways engine. Just like the original version, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot features the well-known symbols of gems and fruits to offer you the ultimate gaming experience. Thanks to the Megaways, you can play with up to 99,225 ways to win. In addition to avalanche wins, there are Dazzling Wild Reels and Free Spins to give you up to 20,000 times the prizes at stake. Discover more in our complete review of the Dazzle Me Megaways slot.
A traditional but impressive graphics
Just like the original game, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot is played on a 6-reel machine. The set up is quite different in the sequel, starting with the Megaways mechanic. On each spin, between 2 and 9 symbols may appear on each reel.
This alters the number of ways to win for that spin. If all 6 reels reach their maximum height, you will have 99,225 Megaways active. As usual for a slot that uses a Megaways game engine, winners are created by landing matching symbols on adjacent reels, starting from reel 1.
The bet levels in Dazzle Me Megaways range from €0.20 to €200 per spin. Click on the coin icon to change the size of your bet accordingly. There is also a Turbo mode and Autoplay feature in some countries (not in the UK from October 2021).
The RTP of Dazzle Megaways is 96.1%, which is average for a Megaways game. The success frequency rate is 23.63%, which means that almost a quarter of spins will result in a winning combination.
The volatility is in the medium range as the biggest wins will come from the free spins. The maximum you can win from a single spin and from a series of avalanches here is 50,000x your total bet per spin.
You will hear a classic fruity-style soundtrack playing in the background as you spin. As usual for a NetEnt slot, the design here is bright and bold and the soundtrack is lively and optimistic.
On the reels, you will find an assortment of gemstone symbols that appear alongside some classic fruity images including clovers, bells, and lucky 7s. The lucky 7s are the most lucrative symbol, paying 3x your total bet if you get 6 on adjacent reels.
The diamond is the Wild symbol. This can replace all standard symbols when it is part of a winning combination. The Wild can also fill entire reels. These Dazzling Wild Reels are in play during the bonus round and can really kick the action into gear when free spins are triggered.
Slot Machine Symbols and Features
At the center of the action is the Megaways game engine that will randomly pick between 2 and 9 symbols to land on the reels based on the maximum height for the 5-5-7-7-9-9 format and therefore create anywhere from 64 to 99,225 ways to win on every spin.
Then there is the rolling reel mechanic with cascading symbols, called the Avalanche feature on NetEnt slots. Land three or more symbols on adjacent reels starting from the leftmost one and you will have a winner. The symbols in a winning combination will explode to make way for new symbols that will fall into their place. The chain reaction will continue until no more new winners occur after an avalanche, potentially allowing you to win multiple times in a single sequence of spins.
However, the main aim is still the Diamond Wilds, both in the base game and in the free spins. They only appear during the Dazzling Wild Reels feature, which is randomly triggered in the base game and on every free spin in the bonus round (more on the latter below). The screen darkens and up to three reels between 2 and 6 become wild for the current spin. Getting a win containing the wild symbols will cause them to shatter along with any other winning symbols before being replaced by regular paying symbols in the following Avalanche.
To trigger the Free Spins feature, you will need to land 4 Free Spins symbols anywhere on the reels in the same spin. Your reward is 8 free spins. You will receive another 4 free spins in addition to the minimum allocation for each extra Free Spins symbol that hits on the triggering spin. Landing 6 Free Spins symbols, for example, will give you 16 free spins.
During the feature, at least 1 reel with be transformed into a Dazzling Wild Reel. The entire reel will be wild for that free spin and for any subsequent avalanche that follows.
Then you have the Dazzling Wild Reels feature. The number of wilds that appear on a Dazzling Wild Reel starts at 2. There are opportunities to add to that number though. Each time you get a win that includes a wild, the counter for that reel increases by 1.

Review: Review of Dazzle Me Megaways:
NetEnt has taken one of its most popular slot games and given it a makeover by including the Big Time Gaming Megaways engine. Just like the original version, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot features the well-known symbols of gems and fruits to offer you the ultimate gaming experience. Thanks to the Megaways, you can play with up to 99,225 ways to win. In addition to avalanche wins, there are Dazzling Wild Reels and Free Spins to give you up to 20,000 times the prizes at stake. NetEnt has taken one of its most popular slot games and given it a makeover by including the Big Time Gaming Megaways engine. Just like the original version, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot features the well-known symbols of gems and fruits to offer you the ultimate gaming experience. Thanks to the Megaways, you can play with up to 99,225 ways to win. In addition to avalanche wins, there are Dazzling Wild Reels and Free Spins to give you up to 20,000 times the prizes at stake. Discover more in our complete review of the Dazzle Me Megaways slot.
A traditional but impressive graphics
Just like the original game, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot is played on a 6-reel machine. The set up is quite different in the sequel, starting with the Megaways mechanic. On each spin, between 2 and 9 symbols may appear on each reel.
This alters the number of ways to win for that spin. If all 6 reels reach their maximum height, you will have 99,225 Megaways active. As usual for a slot that uses a Megaways game engine, winners are created by landing matching symbols on adjacent reels, starting from reel 1.
The bet levels in Dazzle Me Megaways range from €0.20 to €200 per spin. Click on the coin icon to change the size of your bet accordingly. There is also a Turbo mode and Autoplay feature in some countries (not in the UK from October 2021).
The RTP of Dazzle Megaways is 96.1%, which is average for a Megaways game. The success frequency rate is 23.63%, which means that almost a quarter of spins will result in a winning combination.
The volatility is in the medium range as the biggest wins will come from the free spins. The maximum you can win from a single spin and from a series of avalanches here is 50,000x your total bet per spin.
You will hear a classic fruity-style soundtrack playing in the background as you spin. As usual for a NetEnt slot, the design here is bright and bold and the soundtrack is lively and optimistic.
On the reels, you will find an assortment of gemstone symbols that appear alongside some classic fruity images including clovers, bells, and lucky 7s. The lucky 7s are the most lucrative symbol, paying 3x your total bet if you get 6 on adjacent reels.
The diamond is the Wild symbol. This can replace all standard symbols when it is part of a winning combination. The Wild can also fill entire reels. These Dazzling Wild Reels are in play during the bonus round and can really kick the action into gear when free spins are triggered.
Slot Machine Symbols and Features
At the center of the action is the Megaways game engine that will randomly pick between 2 and 9 symbols to land on the reels based on the maximum height for the 5-5-7-7-9-9 format and therefore create anywhere from 64 to 99,225 ways to win on every spin.
Then there is the rolling reel mechanic with cascading symbols, called the Avalanche feature on NetEnt slots. Land three or more symbols on adjacent reels starting from the leftmost one and you will have a winner. The symbols in a winning combination will explode to make way for new symbols that will fall into their place. The chain reaction will continue until no more new winners occur after an avalanche, potentially allowing you to win multiple times in a single sequence of spins.
However, the main aim is still the Diamond Wilds, both in the base game and in the free spins. They only appear during the Dazzling Wild Reels feature, which is randomly triggered in the base game and on every free spin in the bonus round (more on the latter below). The screen darkens and up to three reels between 2 and 6 become wild for the current spin. Getting a win containing the wild symbols will cause them to shatter along with any other winning symbols before being replaced by regular paying symbols in the following Avalanche.
To trigger the Free Spins feature, you will need to land 4 Free Spins symbols anywhere on the reels in the same spin. Your reward is 8 free spins. You will receive another 4 free spins in addition to the minimum allocation for each extra Free Spins symbol that hits on the triggering spin. Landing 6 Free Spins symbols, for example, will give you 16 free spins.
During the feature, at least 1 reel with be transformed into a Dazzling Wild Reel. The entire reel will be wild for that free spin and for any subsequent avalanche that follows.
Then you have the Dazzling Wild Reels feature. The number of wilds that appear on a Dazzling Wild Reel starts at 2. There are opportunities to add to that number though. Each time you get a win that includes a wild, the counter for that reel increases by 1.

Review:
 
Gameplay Features

Dazzle Me Megaways is a 6-reel slot game that features up to 99,225 ways to win thanks to the Megaways mechanic. The game also includes the avalanche feature, rolling reels, and dazzling wild reels. You can play with bets ranging from €0.20 to €200 per spin, with a medium volatility. The game has a 96.1% RTP and a 23.63% success frequency rate.

Winning Potential

Dazzle Me Megaways offers players a maximum payout of 50,000x their total bet per spin. The game's medium volatility means that the largest payouts will come from the free spins, and there is a 23.63% success frequency rate, meaning nearly a quarter of spins will result in a winning combination.

Visual Design

Dazzle Me Megaways has an impressive and traditional graphics layout. The design is bright, bold, and has a classic fruity-style soundtrack playing in the background. The game features an assortment of gemstone symbols and classic fruity images like clovers, bells, and lucky 7s on the reels.

Bonus Features

The Dazzle Me Megaways slot game includes several bonus features to enhance player experience. The Dazzling Wild Reels feature is randomly triggered during the base game and in every free spin in the bonus round. During this feature, up to three reels between 2 and 6 become wild for the current spin. The Free Spins feature is triggered by landing 4 Free Spins symbols in the same spin, which grants you 8 free spins. You get another 4 free spins for each extra Free Spins symbol that lands during the triggering spin. During the Free Spins feature, at least 1 reel will transform into a Dazzling Wild Reel, which will be wild for that free spin and subsequent avalanches.

Reel Mechanics

Dazzle Me Megaways uses the Megaways game engine, which randomly selects between 2 and 9 symbols to land on the reels, resulting in up to 99,225 ways to win. The game also includes the rolling reel mechanic or avalanche feature. Land three or more symbols on adjacent reels starting from the leftmost one, and you have a winner. The symbols in a winning combination will explode to make way for new symbols to fall into place, and the chain reaction will continue until no more new winners occur after an avalanche.

RTP and Volatility

Dazzle Me Megaways has an RTP of 96.1%, which is average for a Megaways game. The volatility of the game is in the medium range, with the largest payouts coming from the Free Spins feature. The success frequency rate is 23.63%, which means that nearly a quarter of spins will result in a winning combination.

Symbols and Wilds

Dazzle Me Megaways features an assortment of gemstone symbols and classic fruity images like clovers, bells, and lucky 7s on the reels. The lucky 7s are the most lucrative symbol, paying 3x your total bet if you get 6 on adjacent reels. The diamond symbol is the Wild and can replace all standard symbols when it is part of a winning combination. The Wild can also fill entire reels, known as Dazzling Wild Reels, which are in play during the bonus round and can really add to the action.

Soundtrack

The soundtrack of Dazzle Me Megaways is classic fruity-style, fitting the design of the game. The music is lively and optimistic, enhancing the overall gaming experience.

Review: Review of Dazzle Me Megaways:
NetEnt has taken one of its most popular slot games and given it a makeover by including the Big Time Gaming Megaways engine. Just like the original version, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot features the well-known symbols of gems and fruits to offer you the ultimate gaming experience. Thanks to the Megaways, you can play with up to 99,225 ways to win. In addition to avalanche wins, there are Dazzling Wild Reels and Free Spins to give you up to 20,000 times the prizes at stake. NetEnt has taken one of its most popular slot games and given it a makeover by including the Big Time Gaming Megaways engine. Just like the original version, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot features the well-known symbols of gems and fruits to offer you the ultimate gaming experience. Thanks to the Megaways, you can play with up to 99,225 ways to win. In addition to avalanche wins, there are Dazzling Wild Reels and Free Spins to give you up to 20,000 times the prizes at stake. Discover more in our complete review of the Dazzle Me Megaways slot.
A traditional but impressive graphics
Just like the original game, the Dazzle Me Megaways slot is played on a 6-reel machine. The set up is quite different in the sequel, starting with the Megaways mechanic. On each spin, between 2 and 9 symbols may appear on each reel.
This alters the number of ways to win for that spin. If all 6 reels reach their maximum height, you will have 99,225 Megaways active. As usual for a slot that uses a Megaways game engine, winners are created by landing matching symbols on adjacent reels, starting from reel 1.
The bet levels in Dazzle Me Megaways range from €0.20 to €200 per spin. Click on the coin icon to change the size of your bet accordingly. There is also a Turbo mode and Autoplay feature in some countries (not in the UK from October 2021).
The RTP of Dazzle Megaways is 96.1%, which is average for a Megaways game. The success frequency rate is 23.63%, which means that almost a quarter of spins will result in a winning combination.
The volatility is in the medium range as the biggest wins will come from the free spins. The maximum you can win from a single spin and from a series of avalanches here is 50,000x your total bet per spin.
You will hear a classic fruity-style soundtrack playing in the background as you spin. As usual for a NetEnt slot, the design here is bright and bold and the soundtrack is lively and optimistic.
On the reels, you will find an assortment of gemstone symbols that appear alongside some classic fruity images including clovers, bells, and lucky 7s. The lucky 7s are the most lucrative symbol, paying 3x your total bet if you get 6 on adjacent reels.
The diamond is the Wild symbol. This can replace all standard symbols when it is part of a winning combination. The Wild can also fill entire reels. These Dazzling Wild Reels are in play during the bonus round and can really kick the action into gear when free spins are triggered.
Slot Machine Symbols and Features
At the center of the action is the Megaways game engine that will randomly pick between 2 and 9 symbols to land on the reels based on the maximum height for the 5-5-7-7-9-9 format and therefore create anywhere from 64 to 99,225 ways to win on every spin.
Then there is the rolling reel mechanic with cascading symbols, called the Avalanche feature on NetEnt slots. Land three or more symbols on adjacent reels starting from the leftmost one and you will have a winner. The symbols in a winning combination will explode to make way for new symbols that will fall into their place. The chain reaction will continue until no more new winners occur after an avalanche, potentially allowing you to win multiple times in a single sequence of spins.
However, the main aim is still the Diamond Wilds, both in the base game and in the free spins. They only appear during the Dazzling Wild Reels feature, which is randomly triggered in the base game and on every free spin in the bonus round (more on the latter below). The screen darkens and up to three reels between 2 and 6 become wild for the current spin. Getting a win containing the wild symbols will cause them to shatter along with any other winning symbols before being replaced by regular paying symbols in the following Avalanche.
To trigger the Free Spins feature, you will need to land 4 Free Spins symbols anywhere on the reels in the same spin. Your reward is 8 free spins. You will receive another 4 free spins in addition to the minimum allocation for each extra Free Spins symbol that hits on the triggering spin. Landing 6 Free Spins symbols, for example, will give you 16 free spins.
During the feature, at least 1 reel with be transformed into a Dazzling Wild Reel. The entire reel will be wild for that free spin and for any subsequent avalanche that follows.
Then you have the Dazzling Wild Reels feature. The number of wilds that appear on a Dazzling Wild Reel starts at 2. There are opportunities to add to that number though. Each time you get a win that includes a wild, the counter for that reel increases by 1.

The bet levels in Dazzle Me Megaways range from €0.20 to €200 per spin. Click on the coin icon to change the size of your bet accordingly. There is also a Turbo mode and Autoplay feature in some countries (not in the UK from October 2021).
The RTP of Dazzle Megaways is 96.1%, which is average for a Megaways game. The success frequency rate is 23.63%, which means that almost a quarter of spins will result in a winning combination.
The volatility is in the medium range as the biggest wins will come from the free spins. The maximum you can win from a single spin and from a series of avalanches here is 50,000x your total bet per spin.
You will hear a classic fruity-style soundtrack playing in the background as you spin. As usual for a NetEnt slot, the design here is bright and bold and the soundtrack is lively and optimistic.
On the reels, you will find an assortment of gemstone symbols that appear alongside some classic fruity images including clovers, bells, and lucky 7s. The lucky 7s are the most lucrative symbol, paying 3x your total bet if you get 6 on adjacent reels.
The diamond is the Wild symbol. This can replace all standard symbols when it is part of a winning combination. The Wild can also fill entire reels. These Dazzling Wild Reels are in play during the bonus round and can really kick the action into gear when free spins are triggered.
Slot Machine Symbols and Features
At the center of the action is the Megaways game engine that will randomly pick between 2 and 9 symbols to land on the reels based on the maximum height for the 5-5-7-7-9-9 format and therefore create anywhere from 64 to 99,225 ways to win on every spin.
Then there is the rolling reel mechanic with cascading symbols, called the Avalanche feature on NetEnt slots. Land three or more symbols on adjacent reels starting from the leftmost one and you will have a winner. The symbols in a winning combination will explode to make way for new symbols that will fall into their place. The chain reaction will continue until no more new winners occur after an avalanche, potentially allowing you to win multiple times in a single sequence of spins.
However, the main aim is still the Diamond Wilds, both in the base game and in the free spins. They only appear during the Dazzling Wild Reels feature, which is randomly triggered in the base game and on every free spin in the bonus round (more on the latter below). The screen darkens and up to three reels between 2 and 6 become wild for the current spin. Getting a win containing the wild symbols will cause them to shatter along with any other winning symbols before being replaced by regular paying symbols in the following Avalanche.
To trigger the Free Spins feature, you will need to land 4 Free Spins symbols anywhere on the reels in the same spin. Your reward is 8 free spins. You will receive another 4 free spins in addition to the minimum allocation for each extra Free Spins symbol that hits on the triggering spin. Landing 6 Free Spins symbols, for example, will give you 16 free spins.
During the feature, at least 1 reel with be transformed into a Dazzling Wild Reel. The entire reel will be wild for that free spin and for any subsequent avalanche that follows.
Then you have the Dazzling Wild Reels feature. The number of wilds that appear on a Dazzling Wild Reel starts at 2. There are opportunities to add to that number though. Each time you get a win that includes a wild, the counter for that reel increases by 1.

The warrior should be surrounded by colorful gemstones and fruits, which are symbols in the game. The background should have a bright and vibrant effect that brings out the lively experience of playing Dazzle Me Megaways.
